terms_page.paragraph: Truek is a platform for exchanging items between users. We are not a party to any transaction or exchange. We are not responsible for the quality, safety, legality, or any other aspect of the items exchanged. All transactions are carried out at your own risk. We are not responsible for any damage or loss, of any nature, that may arise from the exchanges.

how_it_works.step1_description: Post the items you want to exchange. Add photos, descriptions, and what you're looking for in return.
how_it_works.step2_description: Browse items or search for users offering what you need. Connect with people who have what you're looking for.
